attributes.action: Longer Prison Sentences - 5 years should mean 5 years - Life should mean Life - Justice System is far too leanient
attributes.additional_details: Stentences given out are far too leanient, there is no deterrant.  5 years should mean 5 years not out earlier if you behave, if you behave you are released after 5 years if not you serve a longer sentence.  Why is this country so SOFT on the undesireables?
